name: Advanced Web Development
description: Comprehensive course covering modern web development technologies including React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Learn to build full-stack applications from scratch.

name: Data Science and Machine Learning
description: Master data science fundamentals, statistical analysis, and machine learning algorithms using Python and R. Includes hands-on projects and real-world case studies.

name: Digital Marketing Strategy
description: Learn comprehensive digital marketing strategies including SEO, SEM, social media marketing, content marketing, and analytics. Perfect for marketing professionals.

name: Financial Analysis and Investment
description: Advanced course in financial modeling, investment analysis, portfolio management, and risk assessment. Includes practical exercises with real market data.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Comprehensive cybersecurity course covering network security, ethical hacking, vulnerability assessment, and incident response. Includes hands-on labs.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Learn to develop mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using React Native and Flutter. Includes app store deployment strategies.
universityName: Birla Institute of Technology and Science

name: Cloud Computing and DevOps
description: Master cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), containerization with Docker, orchestration with Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines. Industry-relevant skills.

name: Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning
description: Advanced AI course covering neural networks, deep learning frameworks, computer vision, and natural language processing. Includes capstone projects.

name: Business Analytics and Intelligence
description: Learn to analyze business data, create dashboards, and make data-driven decisions using tools like Tableau, Power BI, and SQL.

name: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency
description: Comprehensive blockchain course covering smart contracts, DeFi, NFTs, and cryptocurrency trading strategies. Includes practical blockchain development.
